# NSPageLayout

**Class**

A panel that queries the user for information such as paper type and orientation.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class NSPageLayout
```

## Overview

A page layout panel is typically displayed in response to the user selecting the Page Setup menu item. You obtain an instance with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPageLayout/pageLayout] class method. The pane can then be run as a sheet using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPageLayout/beginSheet(with:modalFor:delegate:didEnd:contextInfo:)] or modally using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPageLayout/runModal()] or [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPageLayout/runModal(with:)].

For design guidance, see [https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/macos/system-capabilities/printing#page-setup-dialogs].

## Running the page setup dialog

- **beginSheet(using:on:completionHandler:)**
- **beginSheet(with:modalFor:delegate:didEnd:contextInfo:)**: Presents a page setup sheet for the specified print info object, document-modal relative to the specified window.
- **runModal()**: Displays the page layout panel and begins the modal loop using the shared print info object.
- **runModal(with:)**: Displays the page layout panel and begins the modal loop using the specified print info object.

## Customizing the page setup dialog

- **addAccessoryController(_:)**: Adds the specified controller of an accessory view to be presented in the page setup panel.
- **removeAccessoryController(_:)**: Removes the specified controller of an accessory view.
- **accessoryControllers**: An array of accessory view controllers belonging to the page layout panel.

## Accessing the printing information

- **printInfo**: The printing information object used when the page layout panel is run.
- **NSPrintInfo**: An object that stores information that’s used to generate printed output.
- **NSPageLayout.Result**

## Print Panels

- **NSPrintPanel**: The Print panel that queries the user for information about a print job.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
